saao/saa05/P334825
a-na LUGAL EN-ia ARAD-ka {1}x x x x lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL EN-ia LUGAL be-li₂ u₂-da ki-i x x x DINGIR ša x+x-ni i-na UGU {KUR}har-ga-a.a am-ra-šu-nu-ni šu-nu ša LUGAL EN-ia šu-nu x x x x x x EN il-ki šu-nu x x x x ih-ta-an-šu ha-pu-su-nu x x x uh-ta-pi-u₂ i-ta-x x x x-u-šu₂-nu ina ša x x x x pa x ku x x x+x x+x x x x x x x x ma-aʾ-da LUGAL be-li₂ x+x x x x x x {KUR}har-gu 03 a-x+x x x hab-bu-ul x MA.NA KUG.UD {LU₂}02-u₂ ša {LU₂}600-E₂.GAL {LU₂}600-E₂.GAL ina qab-si {URU}arba-il₃ i-ta-har-šu u₂-ma-a tu-u-ra ma-a 03 lim 06 me ZI-MEŠ ma-a UŠ₂-MEŠ x ša UN-MEŠ E₂-MEŠ gab-bi i-la-qi UN-MEŠ an-nu-ti la-a UN-MEŠ-šu₂ ša {LU₂}02-u₂ ša {LU₂}600-KUR {LU₂}600-KUR šu-nu x+x x x x x TA {1}ku-ia-ka-a x x x x x x x+x šu-nu x x x x i-du-ak-šu₂-nu {LU₂}02-u₂ ša {LU₂}600-E₂.GAL {LU₂}600-E₂.GAL i-tal-ka ma-a UN-MEŠ-ia šu-nu ina UGU {KUR}har-gi pu-a-gi i-da-bu-ub {KUR}har-ga-a.a i-tal-ka a-na pa-ni-ia i-te-et-zi ma-a la-a qa-la-ka u₂-pa-ṣu-ni an-nu-rig {KUR}har-ga-a.a i-na pa-an LUGAL EN-ia u₂-se-bi-la LUGAL be-li₂ liš-al-šu₂ mi-nu ša {LU₂}02-u₂ {LU₂}600-E₂.GAL {LU₂}600-E₂.GAL TA pa-ni-šu₂ iš-šu₂-u₂-ni di-in-šu₂ o li-ip-ru-su a-ta-a i-na tuk-ka-ni ma-a-ti i-ga-mar bir-ti IGI.2-MEŠ-šu₂ o lu-ma-di-du TA@v ša ŠU.2-ia lu la i-da-bu-ub o x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x {LU₂}EN-x x x x x x x x x ina UGU-hi-ia i-tal-ku-u₂-ni a-sa-ʾa-al-šu₂-nu ma-a x x x x a-ni-nu ina kas-pi ta-da-an-ni ma-a {LU₂}DAM.QAR-ni-ni nu-u₂-da an-nu-rig ina ŠU.2 {LU₂}DUMU-šip-ri-ia {LU₂}DUMU-šip-ri-ia u₂-se-bi-la LUGAL be-li₂ o liš-ʾa-al-šu₂-nu o
